Description: This is one of the great Les Paul 1955 Custom Replicas made by Epiphone. This is a big step in quality above the usual Epi offerings. Thr bridge pickup has na amazing gnarly tone the neck PU is deeply warm and resonant..perfect... It features real Gibson USA P-90 pickups and an ebony board. Close your eyes and play it and the neck feels perfect, exactly like a Gibson USA L.P. Custom neck. The sound is professional and versatile. The deluxe brown hardshell case and COA is included. Heres the specs: Limited Edition with Vintage Style and Gibson USA P-90s! The Epiphone Inspired by "1955" Les Paul Custom Outfit solidbody electric guitar is a limited-edition historic reissue of the tuxedo Les Paul. This Les Paul Custom is loaded with Gibson USA Soapbar P-90 single-coil pickups, and it delivers an incredibly warm, creamy, shiny sound that's full of life. Its rounded C-profile mahogany neck feels like butter in your hands. A fast ebony fingerboard further enhances the exceptional playability of this Les Paul. An aged gloss finish, pearloid inlays, and eye-catching gold hardware ensure that the Epiphone Inspired by "1955" Les Paul Custom Outfit solidbody electric guitar sports a look that's as classic as its sound. Epiphone Inspired by "1955" Les Paul Custom Outfit Solidbody Electric Guitar at a Glance: P-90 pickups deliver the original sound of the Les Paul Select woods for killer tone A classic rock guitar P-90 pickups deliver the original sound of the Les Paul Warm, creamy, shiny, and full of life, the Gibson USA Soapbar P-90s in this Epiphone Inspired by "1955" Les Paul Custom Outfit capture the very essence of the classic pre-PAF P-90. Roll back the tone and keep the volume in check. You've got access to the liquid jazz lines Les Paul himself liked to play. Or open them up full throttle and tap into the slightly rude and gritty tone they have to offer. Simple as they are, these classic pickups give this Les Paul Custom the wide range of classic tone you crave. Select woods for killer tone The Epiphone Inspired by "1955" Les Paul Custom Outfit's mahogany body presents a combination of clarity and definition with warmth, depth, and richness. The set-in mahogany neck and exquisite ebony fretboard further enhance this guitar's tone. You'll love the full-range sound, tonality, and playability of this Les Paul Custom.
Title: Epiphone 1955 Les Paul  Custom Black Beauty
